message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you at a price of $14,000.  I believe it presents significant value for that amount.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,500. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value.
Bob, I understand your perspective on the value.  I'm willing to come down a bit, how about $13,500?
I'm getting close, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,800. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our prices.
